workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.01259191330025633 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.3666871661440166 --weight-decay 0.0002014147810921274 --lr 3.74640368454506e-05 --lr-scheduler fixed --warmup-updates 121601 --min-lr 1e-09 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.19674497640722796 --max-update 350000 --max-epoch 10 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY --tensorboard-logdir $PHILLY_SCRATCH_DIRECTORY
